page.title: 19RECREATION SURVEY - PAISLEY
page.content:
We interviewed people in 6 age-groups about clubs they belong to and other spare time activities. Here are some of our findings.{ {Age Club % Other pursuits
60+ bowling 16 reading bingo 23 gardening {40-60 bingo 25 walking { snooker 17 visiting 20-40 bingo 20 walking golf 7 reading {10-20 youth 43 out playing { uniformed 29 walking 0-10 youth 50 out playing uniformed 30 reading
When asked what they would most like to see added to the area most inter- viewees stated a sports centre. Per- haps the new leisure pool soon to op- en will satisfy this request.
